instruction_text: Use the device when it is ready.
risk_explanation: The term 'ready' is undefined and may be interpreted differently.

instruction_text: Reconnect the internal cable after maintenance.
risk_explanation: The instruction assumes the user knows which cable is referred to.

instruction_text: Insert the cartridge and power on the device.
risk_explanation: The order of actions is important but not explicitly stated.

instruction_text: Press the reset button while holding the power switch and reconnecting the cable.
risk_explanation: Multiple actions in a single step increase cognitive load.

instruction_text: Turn off the device using the power button before opening the back panel.
risk_explanation: The instruction is explicit and clearly ordered.

instruction_text: Operate the system under normal conditions.
risk_explanation: The term 'normal conditions' is not defined.

instruction_text: Adjust the settings appropriately before use.
risk_explanation: The word 'appropriately' is vague.

instruction_text: Ensure proper installation before powering on.
risk_explanation: The term 'proper' lacks specification.

instruction_text: Use sufficient force to secure the component.
risk_explanation: The amount of force required is unclear.

instruction_text: Continue operation until the device responds.
risk_explanation: The expected response is not specified.

instruction_text: Reattach the grounding wire after replacement.
risk_explanation: Assumes the user knows the location of the grounding wire.

instruction_text: Calibrate the sensor before measurement.
risk_explanation: Calibration procedure is not explained.

instruction_text: Restore factory settings if issues persist.
risk_explanation: Assumes knowledge of factory reset process.

instruction_text: Secure the panel using the standard screws.
risk_explanation: Assumes user knows which screws are standard.

instruction_text: Align the module correctly before insertion.
risk_explanation: Correct alignment is not defined.

instruction_text: Connect the power cable and insert the battery.
risk_explanation: The correct order of steps is not specified.

instruction_text: Open the valve and start the pump.
risk_explanation: Sequence matters but is not stated.

instruction_text: Log into the system and configure the settings.
risk_explanation: Login must precede configuration.

instruction_text: Attach the hose and turn on the water supply.
risk_explanation: Improper order may cause leakage.

instruction_text: Insert the memory card and format it.
risk_explanation: Formatting requires prior insertion.

instruction_text: Hold the reset button, turn the dial, and reconnect the cable simultaneously.
risk_explanation: Multiple simultaneous actions increase cognitive load.

instruction_text: Press and hold the switch while rotating the knob and powering on the device.
risk_explanation: Too many actions in one instruction.

instruction_text: Disconnect the cable, press the reset button, and restart the system.
risk_explanation: Multiple actions without step separation.

instruction_text: Lift the cover, align the part, tighten screws, and reconnect the cable.
risk_explanation: Instruction combines many actions.

instruction_text: Unlock the panel, hold the lever, rotate the switch, and power on.
risk_explanation: High action density causes confusion.

instruction_text: Turn off the power supply before opening the casing.
risk_explanation: Clear instruction with explicit order.

instruction_text: Press the start button once to begin operation.
risk_explanation: Simple and unambiguous instruction.

instruction_text: Disconnect the power cable before cleaning the device.
risk_explanation: Clear safety instruction.

instruction_text: Insert the cartridge fully until it clicks into place.
risk_explanation: Specific and well-defined action.

instruction_text: Close the lid securely before starting the machine.
risk_explanation: Clear and easy to follow.
